span.span: Associates a class with a column in a database table.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否可包含 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column can contain null values.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此值设置为 "`false`"，则假定相应列中的数据为非 null。If you set this value to `false`, the data in the corresponding column is assumed to be non-null. > [!NOTE] > 为方便起见，此属性是从 属性复制的。This property is duplicated from the property for convenience. 方法仅使用 属性。The method uses only the property. 出于此原因，必须指定列是否也可以在 属性中包含 null 值。For this reason, you must specify whether a column can contain null values in the property also. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据库列的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the database column.

value.span: 指定在 Transact-sql 表声明中定义列的确切文本的字符串值。

span.span: String value that specifies the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以指定在 Transact-sql 表声明中定义列的确切文本。Use this property to specify the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration. 仅当您计划使用 创建数据库实例时，才指定 属性。Specify the property only if you plan to use to create an instance of the database. 的默认值从成员类型推断而来。The default value of is inferred from the member type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL-CLR 类型映射](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping)。For more information, see [SQL-CLR Type Mapping](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping). ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否为数据库中的计算列。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column is a computed column in a database.
Default = empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 将列定义为包含计算值时，请使用此属性。Use this property when you use to define a column as containing computed values. 例如，如果要创建在 SQL 中定义为 `InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`的列，请使用以下*表达式*字符串： `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`。For example, if you want to create a column defined in SQL as `InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`, use the following *expression* string: `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支持作为主键的计算所得列。does not support computed columns as primary keys. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否包含数据库自动生成的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column contains values that the database auto-generates.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员在插入数据行之后立即同步，成员在 完成后才可用。 members are synchronized immediately after the row of data is inserted, and the members are available after is completed. > [!NOTE] > 如果列保存了主键值，并且你将 指定为 `true`，则还应使用 `IDENTITY` 修饰符来添加 属性。If the column holds primary key values and you designate as `true`, you should also add the property by using the `IDENTITY` modifier. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDiscriminator { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsDiscriminator : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否包含 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 继承层次结构的鉴别器值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a column contains a discriminator value for a [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] inheritance hierarchy.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `true`时，此属性将类成员标识为包含继承层次结构的鉴别器值。When `true`, this property identifies the class member as holding the discriminator value for an inheritance hierarchy. 对于不能有多个成员，可以将此属性设置为 `true`，它必须属于层次结构中最顶层的映射类。You can set this property to `true` for no more than one member, which must belong to the topmost mapped class in the hierarchy. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPrimaryKey { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPrimaryKey : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该类成员是否表示作为表的整个主键或部分主键的列。

span.span: Gets or sets whether this class member represents a column that is part or all of the primary key of the table.
Default = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假设有一个实体类，则必须至少提供一个具有此属性的成员，并且它必须映射到对应的表或视图中的主键或唯一键。Assuming an entity class, you must provide at least one member with this attribute, and it must be mapped to the primary key or a unique key in the corresponding table or view. 如果未执行此操作，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 会将类的实例视为只读，以将更改提交到数据库。Failure to do this prompts [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] to consider instances of the class as read-only for submitting changes to the database. 如果使用此属性指定类的多个成员，则将该键称为关联列的组合。If you designate more than one member of the class by using this property, the key is said to be a composite of the associated columns. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支持作为主键的计算所得列。does not support computed columns as primary keys. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示成员的列类型是否为数据库时间戳或版本号。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the column type of the member is a database timestamp or version number.
Default value = .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次更新相关行时，版本号将递增，并且每次更新时间戳列。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated. （此属性告知 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 应更新列以表明它是一个新版本，而不是记录信息（如进行更新的人员）。(This property tells [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] that a column should be updated to show that it is a new version; it is not meant to record information such as who made the update.) `IsVersion` 为 true 时，请注意以下事项：Note the following when `IsVersion` is true: - 使用 指定正确的修饰符来指定版本号或时间戳列。Use to specify the correct modifiers to designate a version number or timestamp column. 如果不指定 ，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 将推断正确的修饰符。If you do not specify , [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] infers the correct modifiers. 每次更新相关行时，版本号将递增，并且每次更新时间戳列。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated. 在更新数据行之后，将立即同步具有 `IsVersion=true` 的成员。Members with `IsVersion=true` are synchronized immediately after the data row is updated. 完成后，新值可见。The new values are visible after finishes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck UpdateCheck { System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck get(); void set(System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck value); };
member this.UpdateCheck : System.Data.Linq.Mapping.UpdateCheck with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 如何进行开放式并发冲突的检测。

span.span: Gets or sets how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] approaches the detection of optimistic concurrency conflicts.

value.span: 除非 对某个成员为 ，否则默认值为 。

span.span: Default = , unless is for a member.
Other values are and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性与三个枚举之一一起使用，则它将确定 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 如何检测并发冲突。When this property is used with one of three enums, it determines how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] detects concurrency conflicts. 如果没有成员设计为 `IsVersion=true`，则会将原始成员值与当前数据库状态进行比较。If no member is designed as `IsVersion=true`, original member values are compared with the current database state. 以下枚举可用：The following enums are available: - `Always` 始终使用此列进行冲突检测。`Always` Always use this column for conflict detection. - `Never` 从不将此列用于冲突检测。`Never` Never use this column for conflict detection. - `WhenChanged` 仅当该成员已被应用程序更改时使用此列。`WhenChanged` Use this column only when the member has been changed by the application. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#10)]
